data.persona: I am a guest of the faeries. I am staying in their room made of grass and wood until it is safe for me to return to the mountains. I am being guarded by beetles. We are feasting on mushrooms. I am cold and scared.
data.description:
You are in the The  main hall.
Long hallway with high ceilings, long windows, and a very intricate designed ceiling.
There's a tapestry, a Window, a rug, a castle, a Long hallway, a ceiling, a main hall, a painting., and a long windows here.
The king and the the queen are here.

You are carrying a Handkerchief and an sleeping bag, and wearing a ceremonial hat and a dress.

data.short_motivation: I will hug the queen to show my love for her.
data.mid_motivation: If the queen takes a liking to me, she will allow me to seek refuge here in the castle.
data.long_motivation: I must hide out in the castle for the next few weeks until the dark knights stop looking for me.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: give Handkerchief with request for safe quarter written on it to queen
